original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: US officials Vance, Rubio, and Witkoff have been appointed to facilitate a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Ukraine's Vladimir Zelensky, as per the White House announcement. The aim is to expedite talks and begin the next phase of the peace process, following a phone conversation between Trump and Putin.</s>
